sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STARAJA-RUSSA, a city of Russia in the province of Moscow and government of Novogorod, the capital of a circle of the same name. It is 206 miles from Petersburg, on the river Polesta. lt is an ill-built place, containing 1048 houses, many of them of wood, and 6200 inhabitants. There is a copious brine spring, from which about 100,000 bushels of culinary salt are annually made, and this is the chief trade of the place. Lat. 57. 51. Long. 32. 54. 25. E.
